ow.dht.impl
インタフェース DHTProvider

既知の実装クラスの一覧:
BasicDHTProvider, CHTProvider, ChurnTolerantDHTProvider, MemcachedProvider

メソッドの詳細

getNames

java.lang.String[] getNames()
Return the names of the DHT implementation that this provider supports.

getDHT

<V extends java.io.Serializable> DHT<V> getDHT(short applicationID,
                                               short applicationVersion,
                                               DHTConfiguration config,
                                               ID selfID)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
Returns an instance of DHT. Note that the working directory specified in the DHTConfiguration is created.

パラメータ:
applicationID - ID of application embedded in a message signature to avoid cross-talk between different applications.
selfID - ID of this instance. It is determined consistently based on the hostname if not specified.
例外:
java.lang.Exception

getDHT

<V extends java.io.Serializable> DHT<V> getDHT(DHTConfiguration config,
                                               RoutingService routingSvc)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
Returns an instance of DHT. Note that the working directory specified in the DHTConfiguration is created.

例外:
java.lang.Exception
